overview: Tade Oyerinde is the founder and CEO of Gleepost, which he started in his university dorm room in 2012 with flatmate Patrick Molgaard and brother Tosh Oyerinde. Tade attended Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University in Daytona Beach, FL as well as the University of Leeds in England, where he met Patrick Molgaard. Gleepost launched in April 2012 at the university of Leeds and has since had hundreds of Leeds University students sign up.
